thread.title: Lovely Hotel -
thread.title_full: Lovely Hotel - Review of Library Hotel by Library Hotel Collection, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: LizMc61
title: Lovely Hotel -
text: What a lovely hotel! As a librarian it was on my list as soon as I knew I was going to New York! Well appointed rooms, clean and well appointed. Concierge was very helpful. The lounge of the second floor is a great place to relax and enjoy breakfast in the morning or a glass of wine and cheese and biscuits in the evening. Great location as well.
